Vignette.synopsis: Quiet area away from the main streets. Somebody here has forgotten about her dead children, in blissful state.Lug is peacefully looking over the bridge, softly singing a lullaby. If spoken to, she laughs and tells you she’s had this song suck in her head for some reason! She doesn’t know any children, how odd.

Vignette_AD.synopsis: Quiet area away from the main streets. Somebody here has forgotten about her dead children, in blissful state.Lug is peacefully looking over the bridge, softly singing a lullaby. If spoken to, she laughs and tells you she’s had this song suck in her head for some reason! She doesn’t know any children, how odd.

Vignette_0.speaker: Lug
Vignette_0.text: Odd, isn't it? My parents never sang me lullabies - yet I've got one wormed in my mind, clear as day.
Vignette_0.context: NodeContext: Confused as she thinks aloud - touch of unknowning sadness on the edge

Vignette_1.speaker: Lug
Vignette_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: humming a lullaby tune to herselfNodeContext: humming a lullaby tune to herself - use same tune as LOW_LullabyElf_VignetteAD

Vignette_2.speaker: Lug
Vignette_2.text: Pardon my singing. That lullaby's been stuck in my head since... Funny - I can't recall.
Vignette_2.context: NodeContext: slightly embarassed laugh, you've been caught sining lullabies

Vignette_AD_0.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_0.text: Darkness shan't find thee - the shadows despair.
Vignette_AD_0.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_7.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_7.text: They will not touch 'pon a lock of your hair.
Vignette_AD_7.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_1.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_1.text: Trust the Elf-Father and grip my hand tight...
Vignette_AD_1.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_5.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_5.text: We shall walk with you into that pitch night.
Vignette_AD_5.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_4.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_4.text: Hush little elfling, thou need'st not look far...
Vignette_AD_4.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_2.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_2.text: To feel the light of Corellon's bright star.
Vignette_AD_2.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_6.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_6.text: Once we see sunlight, the dawn of a day...
Vignette_AD_6.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy

Vignette_AD_3.speaker: Lug
Vignette_AD_3.text: That's when we know we've been kept by the Fey.
Vignette_AD_3.context: NodeContext: singing an elven lullaby, simple rhythm, airy
